location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Camp Sambur [SƒÅmbhar] to Charles Umpherston Aitchison

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a further report from Colonel Wright on the health of the Maharana [Maharana Shambhu Singh] and informing him that all necessary precautions will be taken to prevent 'Suttee' and to make arrangements for administration in the event of his death and encouraging Colonel Wright to do all he can to encourage His Highness to name a successor.The report from Colonel Wright is not enclosed.
